messages.subject: Meta-New-Age information
messages.msgSnippet: -=-The gifted and mystical children of today are waiting for us to become the pillars of strength and counsel they need to begin the work they have come here
messages.messageBody:
-=-The gifted and mystical children

of today are waiting for us to become the pillars of

strength and counsel they need to begin the work they

have come here to do. Are you ready? Are you

prepared? -=-

Some of you who don't know about this magazine might be interested. They
have an article I wrote about homeschooling at their website.

I was amused, in this newsletter, to find that after using terms like gifted
and mystical and indigo and rainbow, lots about ADHD, there's mention of a
current article on how labels hurt children. Then back to stuff like "an
introduction to the appearance and

rise of Meta-Human Consciousness as seen in

Generations X, Y, and Z and includes a

summation of Star Child ways, needs, and the gifts

they bring. "

And there's information on authors of whom it is written " Both women are

Indigo/Crystal adults from South Africa. " Maybe even some adults feel
better if they're labelled.

Interesting juxtapositions.

==============


Children of the New Earth Magazine Newsletter

Greetings! (May 2004)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


A Welcome from Dona Reynolds, Deputy Editor


The children are waiting for us. Yes, we adults need to

step up to the plate. The gifted and mystical children

of today are waiting for us to become the pillars of

strength and counsel they need to begin the work they

have come here to do. Are you ready? Are you

prepared? Children of the New Earth Magazine is

endeavoring to assist you with all the latest information

and guidance available today not only from experts in

the field but from the parents, grandparents, and

caregivers who work daily with these amazing, but

sometimes frustrating children. Together we can clear

the path the children need to move forward on.


In the

next few issues of Children of the New Earth magazine

you will see articles from experts in the field of

ADD/ADHD, Autism, and other developments in the

children of today. These symptoms classified

as "disabilities" just may not be disabilities at all. We

intend to bring you information that will change

your mind. Are drugs such as Ritalin really the

answer? Or are there new healing modalities that our

children will respond to that do not include drug

therapy? Yes, there are and we will bring you the

newest life-changing information coming into the field

today. Are you ready? A new day and time is upon

us. We intend to brighten your path with the latest

information available for you in your quest of standing

strong for the children of today.


Please check and be sure you have renewed your

subscription so you won't miss out on any of our future

issues. You can do that by going to our website and

clicking on My Account, enter your username and

password, and you will see your subscription

information. You can also use the website to make any

changes in your address if you are moving. The post

office is not obligated to forward magazines, and in

some cases they simply do not bother. It costs us an

additional $1.29 plus the cost of the magazine to mail

you a replacement. If you have not been receiving

your magazines, please contact us immediately and be

sure to change your address through the CNE

website.



We believe this magazine is critical. As we do not earn

big bucks from advertising because we feel bringing you

information is more important than advertising, we have

to be very careful to conserve every penny and many

of us do not take any money in salary, preferring to

make sure all the profits go back into ensuring the

magazine continues to thrive and grow before we do

so.



Remember to forward the Newsletter to your friends,

family, and clients by clicking on the link at the bottom

of the Newsletter.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In this issue

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* THE SPRING ISSUE IS HERE!

* COSMIKIDS COMMUNIQUE

* HOLISTIC MOMS NETWORK REACHES NEW HEIGHTS!

* STAR CHILDREN WEBSITE

* NATURAL FAMILY ONLINE

* PLANETLIGHTWORKER.COM

* THE JOURNEY TO WILD DIVINE

* EXCLUSIVE BOOK OFFER FOR CNE READERS

* SNIPPETS OF IMPORTANT INFORMATION



THE SPRING ISSUE IS HERE!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In this Spring issue, Dr. Diana Fatayerji has

detailed, pertinent information you need to know

regarding the debate over childhood vaccinations. You

will definitely want to read the list of vaccine

ingredients, the risks involved as well as the options

available. Although we have listed the ALTERNATIVE

VACCINATION SCHEDULE on the CNE website under

Free Articles, you will

want to order the Spring issue by clicking the link below

to read the entire article. Don't miss this extremely

important information.


If your family is struggling with what society calls

ADD/ADHD, then you don't want to miss Barbara

Bullard's article "MetaMusic: Opening the Learning Door

in the ADD Mind". Barbara's article gives you the key

to superlearning. You'll also find an intriguing book

excerpt from Thom Hartmann's book "The Edison Gene:

ADHD & the Gift of the Hunter Child". This book will

give you a different perspective on ADHD that will

definitely make you stop and think.


With articles such as "Raising Truthful Kids"

by Elisa Medhus, M.D., "Parent Talk" with Chick

Moorman, and "5 Breaths That Last A Lifetime: Yoga for

Children" by Annie Buckley, you will find a wealth of

information in this Spring Issue.


Daniel Jacob's feature article "Star Children: Birth of

the

Meta-Human" will give you insight into the offspring of

the Baby Boomers and the rise of Meta-Human

consciousness on Planet Earth. With articles on

children and the internet, astrology, how labels affect

your child, gluten-free baking, recommended books and

resources, this issue will be instrumental in changing

the consciousness of parenting today.


Order the Spring Issue here >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.t5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.childrenofthenewearth.com%2Fshop%2F


COSMIKIDS COMMUNIQUE

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A warm hello to all of you who have joined our

CosmiKids family of pioneers!

It is through this venue that we will keep you up to

date on all of our exciting developments as we grow

and expand to meet and exceed your needs and

expectations as future franchisees, homeschoolers,

teachers and kids with backyard CosmiKids kits.


We have had information and franchise requests from

Spain, France, U.K., Australia, Hawaii, Canada and all

parts of the U.S. It is our intention to offer our

revolutionary franchise package in the 4th quarter of

2004. Our comprehensive market test will precede our

offering to ensure a seamless operation with a stellar

support system; progressive, cutting edge curriculum

and state-of-the-art d√©cor, playware and portable

design units.


Certification and training will be scheduled for the latter

part of 2004, with on-line training for assistants

available just after the New Year. We'll keep you

updated on all of our evolutionary

curriculum-in-development. Honestly, you'll want to be

a kid again just to experience all that we have in store.

The good news is you can enjoy it right along with the

kids! For there's a CosmiKid in all of us! Call or e-mail

me anytime at judy@.... or 760-438-0143.


Be sure to read the free article on the CNE website by

Carolyn Kaufman, CosmiKids Director of Operations.

She has a very insightful article "Living As A Free

Spirit". Just go to the Children of the New Earth

website and click on "Free Articles".


Blessings and Peace,


Judy


Find out more... >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.7xldwzn6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cosmikids.org


HOLISTIC MOMS NETWORK REACHES NEW HEIGHTS!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Holistic Moms Network, a non-profit organization,

has been growing by leaps and bounds in recent

months! The organization currently has twelve

chapters in progress in New Jersey, three forming in

New York, three in Pennsylvania, and one in Ohio.

Moms from across the country have been inquiring

about starting up chapters in their area and many more

are expected to be created in 2004.


The Holistic Moms Network was founded by moms and

for moms as a community building coalition. At its core,

the HMN helps moms find their tribe, remember their

spirit and connect to new friends. Offering everything

from playgroups to lending libraries, the HMN embraces

healthy living for all people. We seek to empower

women to make mindful choices that fit their families

and their priorities.


To Learn More >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.u5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.holisticmoms.org


STAR CHILDREN WEBSITE

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If you've read Daniel Jacobs amazing article in the

Spring Issue titled "Star Children - Birth of the Meta-

Human?", then you may want to find out more of what

Daniel has to say by visiting his website.


His website is an introduction to the appearance and

rise of Meta-Human Consciousness as seen in

Generations X, Y, and Z and includes a

summation of Star Child ways, needs, and the gifts

they bring. There are articles, links, and

descriptions....outlining mood changes, special

abilities, behavioral challenges, adaptation techniques,

current research, and up to the minute news. There is

also a link that describes and explores a "child-friendly"

society. Most of the articles and info are by Visionary

Writer and Bio-Energy Therapist Daniel Jacob. His Star

Children website is a sister site to

www.reconnections.net .


Find out more... >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.v5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thestarchildren.com


NATURAL FAMILY ONLINE

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There's a gaping hole out there for families who are

somewhere in between "mainstream" and "crunchy-

granola." Where do you find support if you're out there

in the middle? And where can you get solid information

about moving toward a more natural lifestyle - without

being clobbered over the head by the "granola police"?

Natural Family Online magazine shows you how easy it

is to fold natural, holistic practices into your daily

family life.


"There are so many aspects of natural parenting,

attachment parenting and natural family living, and not

all of them are practiced in any given family," says NFO

Editor Lisa Poisso. "All sorts of different combinations

work - but the result is that sometimes parents feel

out of place in places that seem predominantly

mainstream or strongly alternative. Natural Family

Online strikes a balance between those philosophies,

while always offering families the tools and strategies

they need to learn more about and move toward more

natural, holistic ways of parenting."


Visit us at >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.w5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.naturalfamilyonline.com


PLANETLIGHTWORKER.COM

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Wondering how the Children of the New Earth Magazine

came into existence? It all began on our sister website

PlanetLightworker.com. Sandie Sedgbeer, editor of

PlanetLightworker and Children of the New Earth

Magazine, began to see the need for more information

on these brilliant children while watching the response

from those parents who were reading the informative

articles on PlanetLightworker.com.


Parents and caregivers wanted more information, so

Children of the New Earth Magazine and website were

birthed. The underlying philosophy of PlanetLightworker

is to provide a space for many different flavors of

truth. PlanetLightworker, as all loving parents do, helps

finance its child, CNE Magazine.


We invite you to visit the Mother website. There are

lots of free articles to read both from the front page

and in the archives. And perhaps you might wish to

subscribe to PlanetLightworker.com. At only $2 per

month, it's the best deal going and it insures that

Children of the New Earth Magazine will continue to

grow.


Check out CNE's mother >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.x5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.planetlightworker.com


THE JOURNEY TO WILD DIVINE

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We have found an amazing computer game for you and

your children! The Journey to Wild Divine, with its

biofeedback sensors, is no ordinary game. It is filled

with tasks that

utilize our intention to accomplish. It has aspects that

are purely instructional and provides stunning visuals

that delight the soul. It has fun exercises that

demonstrate our ability to utilize our own

mind/emotions/spirit through the body to achieve a

desired goal. And it activates the visualization capacity

of the mind. There are objects to find and retrieve,

there are tests to take related to internal states, and

there are beautiful scenes to partake in that bring a

feeling of peace and delight to our senses.


With a soundtrack that gives just the right background

for each part of the journey, the experience can be

transformative. There is a little something for everyone

in this game.


Check out Kathleen Jacoby's review at

www.PlanetLightworker.com. Kathleen is a

professional numerologist with over 25 years of

experience. She is also one of PlanetLightworker's

earliest contributors and an incredible spiritual teacher.


This is an exceptional biofeedback computer game for

children and adults. I've tried it - it's amazing! To find

out more about this game click on the link below. If

you choose to purchase it, please do so through this

link as PlanetLightworker.com and Children of the New

Earth will be supported in the process.


For more information >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.y5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wilddivine.com%2Fbanner.php


EXCLUSIVE BOOK OFFER FOR CNE READERS

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The exclusive book offer for CNE readers will continue

until the end of May. "Spiritually Healing the Indigo

Children (and Adult Indigos, Too!) The Practical Guide

and Handbook", the book that Lee Carroll and Jan Tober

are calling "the ultimate Indigo workbook" is available

through the CNE website.

For a limited time, CNE readers and subscribers can

order the book at 50% OFF THE RETAIL PRICE & FREE

DOMESTIC SHIPPING! Click on the link below for more

information and to place your order.


Info on exclusive book offer >>
http://rs6.net/tn.jsp?t=gmx8b9n6.h5mnvzn6.z5n7f9n6.ptixszn6.301&p=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.childrenofthenewearth.com%2Fnewsflash%2Fs
pirituallyhealingindigos.shtml


SNIPPETS OF IMPORTANT INFORMATION

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Interested in attending a KRYON seminar for free? We

are looking for people to represent CNE at the following

KRYON events. Please contact

audrey@... if you are

interested:


Westport, CT June 5

Pittsburgh, PA June 6

Omaha, NB June 12

Traverse City, MI June 13

Nashua, NH Sept. 26


In our June Newsletter, we will be telling you about

Andrea Candee, Master Herbalist, Instructor, and

Author of "Gentle Healing for Baby and Child" who will

be writing a column for the magazine beginning in the

Summer Issue. Visit her website at

www.andreacandee.com.



If you haven't visited the STARCHILD website of Celia

Fenn and Kate Spreckley, then you are missing out on

some excellent information. Both women are

Indigo/Crystal adults from South Africa. Visit them at

www.starchild.co.za.


Below are a few other websites you might like to visit:



www.angriesout.com

www.healthychild.com


www.crystalchildren.com

www.energyconnectiontherapies.com

www.onionhead.com
